name: spartan-api
description: APIs to create and verify spartan auth certificates
readme:
NodeJS Javascript APIs to:

1. Fetch certificates from Attestation Server, sign
   and pass it to the caller. The caller application 
   pass this cert token to the server using HTTP header:
   x-spartan-auth-token: <cert token> 
2. APIs used by server side to validate the cert token
   passed by the client in HTTP header
